subject: Golf
lead_paragraph: Tiger Woods won with a huge putt on the final green, the longest putt he had made in the tournament: a nasty, hard-breaking slider of a putt that would have made Ben Hogan cringe.
snippet: Tiger Woods won with a huge putt on the final green, the longest putt he had made in the tournament: a nasty, hard-breaking slider of a putt that would have made Ben Hogan cringe.
